backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing user profiles and lead submissions with admin/user access control using AccessControl and MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing location‑update tasks, affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global design tokens, light/dark theme variables, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app root and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with routes for all pages and renders RouterProvider.
frontend/src/components/conversion/Stick: Mobile-only bottom CTA bar linking to contact and WhatsApp using MARKETING_CONFIG.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing branding, navigation links, contact info from MARKETING_CONFIG, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with logo, desktop/mobile navigation, and active route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper composing Header, Footer, main content Outlet, and mobile CTA.
frontend/src/components/sections/LeadFor: A lead capture form that collects user contact details and submits them via a custom hook, showing success UI after submission.
frontend/src/components/sections/Limited: File is empty or contains no implementation.
frontend/src/components/sections/MapEmbe: Embeds a Google Maps iframe inside a styled card using marketing config values.
frontend/src/components/sections/PlanCom: Displays a comparison table of gym membership plans with feature availability for desktop and mobile views.
frontend/src/components/sections/Trainer: Shows a grid of trainer cards using coach data, highlighting specialties and experience.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Updates document metadata and injects structured JSON-LD for SEO using branding and marketing config.
frontend/src/components/social/Testimoni: A carousel displaying user testimonials with ratings, avatars, and text.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Defines static branding data including logo path and company name.
frontend/src/config/coaches.ts: Exports coach interface and a list of coach profiles with specialties and experience.
frontend/src/config/marketing.ts: Contains marketing-related configuration such as contact details, maps URL, location info, and working hours.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages a backend actor using identity, with query caching and access control initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading stored identities and handling login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a hook that fetches all leads using a backend actor with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitLead.ts: Defines a mutation hook to submit a lead and invalidate the leads list when successful.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup including custom color variables, typography tweaks, and accessibility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, vision, and reasons to choose the gym, using marketing config and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/CafePage.tsx: Displays the Fitness Café page with nutrition concept details and menu category sections.
Renders the contact and free trial booking page with a lead form, contact details, and location info.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the marketing-focused home page with hero, services, testimonials, trainer highlights, and SEO metadata using MARKETING_CONFIG.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPlansPage.t: Displays membership pricing tiers with plan details, comparison table, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramsPage.tsx: Shows detailed descriptions of fitness programs with icons, benefits, and contact CTAs plus SEO metadata.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend theme.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, feature requests, and state for updating location and contact information to Kekri.
